headline: 5 Shoes & Retail Apparel Stocks Positioned for Growth Amid Athleisure Boom
summary: The Shoes & Retail Apparel industry is harnessing athleisure demand and digital growth, even as rising costs and supply challenges pressure margins. Stocks like NKE, ADDYY, SKX, BIRK and WWW remain well-positioned.

headline: Nike Upgraded to Buy at TD Cowen on Margin Recovery Outlook
summary: Analysts see $6 billion free cash flow and stronger brand momentum ahead

headline: Why lululemon May Lose More Than Just Margin: The Pricing Power Dilemma
summary: Lululemon appears undervalued on traditional metrics, but weak revenue growth and rising costs undermine its risk-reward profile. Learn more about LULU stock here.
